title: Decimal expansion
content: Define a decimal expansion constructor. The decimal expansions built with this constructor are not meant to be used alone outside of this chapter. Rather, they are meant to be used exclusively as part of a decimal number with a decimal fraction, for example ` ( 3 . _ 1 _ 4 _ 1 _ 5 9 ) ` . That decimal point operator is defined in the next section. The bulk of these constructions have originally been proposed by David A. Wheeler on 12-May-2015, and discussed with Mario Carneiro in this thread: ~ https://groups.google.com/g/metamath/c/2AW7T3d2YiQ .

blocks.name: cdp2
blocks.content: Constant used for decimal fraction constructor. See ~ df-dp2 .
blocks.origin: prop class cdp2(class c0, class c1) { _(c0, c1) }

blocks.name: diff.cdp2.s
diff.cdp2.c
diff.cdp2.w
df-dp2
blocks.content: Define the "decimal fraction constructor", which is used to build up "decimal fractions" in base 10. This is intentionally similar to ~ df-dec . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Sep-2021.)

blocks.name: dp2eq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the decimal expansion constructor. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)

blocks.name: dp20u
blocks.content: Add a zero in the tenths (lower) place. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dp20u(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cdp2(c0, nat0), c0)
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
} = {
  3eqtri(cdp2(c0, nat0), c0, co(c0, caddc, co(nat0, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(c0, caddc, nat0))
  df-dp2(c0, nat0)
  oveq2i(c0, caddc, co(nat0, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), nat0)
  mp2an(wceq(co(nat0, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), nat0), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cc), wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  recni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  nn0rei(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn0()
  gtneii(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0)
  0re()
  10pos()
  div0(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  addid1i(c0)
  nn0cni(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dp20u(class c0) {
  ⊢ _(c0, 0)= c0
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ℕ0
} = {
  3eqtri(_(c0, 0), c0, (c0[+](0[÷]cdc(1, 0))), (c0[+]0))
  df-dp2(c0, nat0)
  oveq2i(c0, caddc, (0[÷]cdc(1, 0)), nat0)
  mp2an((0[÷]cdc(1, 0))= 0, cdc(1, 0)∈ ℂ, cdc(1, 0)≠ 0)
  recni(cdc(1, 0))
  nn0rei(cdc(1, 0))
  10nn0()
  gtneii(cdc(1, 0), nat0)
  0re()
  10pos()
  div0(cdc(1, 0))
  addid1i(c0)
  nn0cni(c0)
}

blocks.name: dp20h
blocks.content: Add a zero in the unit places. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dp20h(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cdp2(nat0, c0), co(c0, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  -| wcel(c0, crp)
} = {
  eqtri(cdp2(nat0, c0), co(c0, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(nat0, caddc, co(c0, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  df-dp2(nat0, c0)
  addid2i(co(c0, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  divcli(c0, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  ax-mp(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c0, crp))
  rpcn(c0)
  nn0cni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn0()
  gtneii(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0)
  0re()
  10pos()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dp20h(class c0) {
  ⊢ _(0, c0)=(c0[÷]cdc(1, 0))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ℝ+
} = {
  eqtri(_(0, c0), (c0[÷]cdc(1, 0)), (0[+](c0[÷]cdc(1, 0))))
  df-dp2(nat0, c0)
  addid2i((c0[÷]cdc(1, 0)))
  divcli(c0, cdc(1, 0))
  ax-mp(c0 ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  rpcn(c0)
  nn0cni(cdc(1, 0))
  10nn0()
  gtneii(cdc(1, 0), nat0)
  0re()
  10pos()
}

blocks.name: dp2cl
blocks.content: Closure for the decimal fraction constructor if both values are reals. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.)

blocks.name: dp2clq
blocks.content: Closure for a decimal fraction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dp2clq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(cdp2(c0, c1), cq)
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, cq)
} = {
  eqeltri(cdp2(c0, c1), cq, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  mp2an(wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), cq), wcel(c0, cq), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cq))
  sselii(c0, cq, cn0)
  mp3an(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cq), wcel(c1, cq), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cq), wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  sselii(cdc(nat1, nat0), cq, cn0)
  nn0ssq()
  10nn0()
  gtneii(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0)
  0re()
  10pos()
  qdivcl(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  qaddcl(c0, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dp2clq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ _(c0, c1)∈ ℚ
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ℕ0
  ⊣ c1 ∈ ℚ
} = {
  eqeltri(_(c0, c1), cq, (c0[+](c1[÷]cdc(1, 0))))
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  mp2an((c0[+](c1[÷]cdc(1, 0)))∈ ℚ, c0 ∈ ℚ, (c1[÷]cdc(1, 0))∈ ℚ)
  sselii(c0, cq, cn0)
  mp3an((c1[÷]cdc(1, 0))∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℚ, cdc(1, 0)∈ ℚ, cdc(1, 0)≠ 0)
  sselii(cdc(1, 0), cq, cn0)
  nn0ssq()
  10nn0()
  gtneii(cdc(1, 0), nat0)
  0re()
  10pos()
  qdivcl(c1, cdc(1, 0))
  qaddcl(c0, (c1[÷]cdc(1, 0)))
}

blocks.name: rpdp2cl
blocks.content: Closure for a decimal fraction in the positive real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpdp2cl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(cdp2(c0, c1), crp)
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, crp)
} = {
  eqeltri(cdp2(c0, c1), crp, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  mpbir2an(wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), crp), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))))
  mp2an(wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr))
  readdcl(c0, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  mp2an(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))))
  pm3.2i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr))
  nn0rei(c0)
  sselii(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr, crp)
  rpssre()
  pm3.2i(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  nn0ge0i(c0)
  ax-mp(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), crp))
  mp2an(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), crp), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), crp))
  ax-mp(wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), crp), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cn))
  10nn()
  nnrp(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  rpdivcl(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  rpgt0(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  addgegt0(c0, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  elrp(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
}

blocks.name: rpdp2cl2
blocks.content: Closure for a decimal fraction with no decimal expansion in the positive real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: dp2lt10
blocks.content: Decimal fraction builds real numbers less than 10. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dp2lt10(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, crp)
  -| wbr(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  -| wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
} = {
  eqbrtri(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdc(nat1, nat0), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  breqtri(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, cdc(nat1, nat0), co(nat9, caddc, nat1))
  mp2an(wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(nat9, caddc, nat1)), wbr(c0, cle, nat9), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1))
  mpbir(wbr(c0, cle, nat9), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat9, caddc, nat1)))
  breqtrri(c0, clt, co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cdc(nat1, nat0))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, cle, nat9), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat9, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(nat9, cz))
  nn0zi(c0)
  nn0zi(nat9)
  9nn0()
  zleltp1(c0, nat9)
  mpbir(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), crp))
  elrpii(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  divlt1lt(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  mp2an(wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, nat9), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(nat9, caddc, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr)), wa(wcel(nat9, cr), wcel(nat1, cr)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr))
  nn0rei(c0)
  redivcli(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  sselii(c1, cr, crp)
  rpssre()
  10re()
  gtneii(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0)
  0re()
  10pos()
  pm3.2i(wcel(nat9, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  9re()
  1re()
  leltadd(c0, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), nat9, nat1)
  9p1e10()
}

blocks.name: dp2lt
blocks.content: Comparing two decimal fractions (equal unit places). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dp2lt(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c0, c2))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, crp)
  -| wcel(c2, crp)
  -| wbr(c1, clt, c2)
} = {
  3brtr4i(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c0, c2), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  mp2an(wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), w3a(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  mp3an(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cr), wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  redivcl(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  mp3an(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cr), wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0))
  gtneii(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat0)
  0re()
  redivcl(c2, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  nn0rei(c0)
  mpbi(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  mp3an(wb(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  sselii(c1, cr, crp)
  sselii(c2, cr, crp)
  rpssre()
  pm3.2i(wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  10re()
  10pos()
  ltdiv1(c1, c2, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  imp(w3a(wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(c0, caddc, co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))))
  axltadd(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), co(c2, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), c0)
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  df-dp2(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: dp2ltsuc
blocks.content: Comparing a decimal fraction with the next integer. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dp2ltsuc(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, c2)
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, crp)
  -| wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  -| wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c2)
} = {
  3brtr4i(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, c2, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  mpbi(wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1))
  breqtri(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  mpbi(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  ltdiv1ii(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0), cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10pos()
  dividi(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  recni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  ltadd2i(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), nat1, c0)
  redivcli(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  ax-mp(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c1, crp))
  rpre(c1)
  10re()
  nnne0i(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn()
  1re()
  nn0rei(c0)
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  eqcomi(c2, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dp2ltsuc(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ _(c0, c1)[<]c2
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ℕ0
  ⊣ c1 ∈ ℝ+
  ⊣ c1[<]cdc(1, 0)
  ⊣ (c0[+]1)= c2
} = {
  3brtr4i(_(c0, c1), clt, c2, (c0[+](c1[÷]cdc(1, 0))), (c0[+]1))
  mpbi((c0[+](c1[÷]cdc(1, 0)))[<](c0[+]1), (c1[÷]cdc(1, 0))[<]1)
  breqtri((c1[÷]cdc(1, 0)), clt, nat1, (cdc(1, 0)[÷]cdc(1, 0)))
  mpbi((c1[÷]cdc(1, 0))[<](cdc(1, 0)[÷]cdc(1, 0)), c1[<]cdc(1, 0))
  ltdiv1ii(c1, cdc(1, 0), cdc(1, 0))
  10pos()
  dividi(cdc(1, 0))
  recni(cdc(1, 0))
  ltadd2i((c1[÷]cdc(1, 0)), nat1, c0)
  redivcli(c1, cdc(1, 0))
  ax-mp(c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ+)
  rpre(c1)
  10re()
  nnne0i(cdc(1, 0))
  10nn()
  1re()
  nn0rei(c0)
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  eqcomi(c2, (c0[+]1))
}

blocks.name: dp2ltc
blocks.content: Comparing two decimal expansions (unequal higher places). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dp2ltc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wbr(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c2, c3))
  -| wcel(c0, cn0)
  -| wcel(c1, crp)
  -| wcel(c2, cn0)
  -| wcel(c3, crp)
  -| wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  -| wbr(c0, clt, c2)
} = {
  3brtr4i(cdp2(c0, c1), clt, cdp2(c2, c3), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  mp2an(wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))))
  mp2an(wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, c2), wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c2))
  mpbi(wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1))
  mpbir(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), crp))
  divlt1lt(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  mp3an(wb(wbr(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), clt, nat1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  ltadd2(co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), nat1, c0)
  mpbi(wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c2)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  nn0zi(c0)
  nn0zi(c2)
  zltp1le(c0, c2)
  ltletri(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(c0, caddc, nat1), c2)
  readdcli(c0, nat1)
  1re()
  mp2an(wbr(c2, clt, co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), crp))
  ax-mp(wcel(co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)), crp), wa(wcel(c3, crp), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), crp)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(c3, crp), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), crp))
  mpbir2an(wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), crp), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  elrp(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  rpdivcl(c3, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  ltaddrp(c2, co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  lttri(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))), c2, co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
  readdcli(c0, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  nn0rei(c0)
  redivcli(c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  sselii(c1, cr, crp)
  readdcli(c2, co(c3, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  nn0rei(c2)
  redivcli(c3, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  sselii(c3, cr, crp)
  rpssre()
  gt0ne0ii(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10re()
  10pos()
  df-dp2(c0, c1)
  df-dp2(c2, c3)
}
